level.heading: ADMINISTRATIVE PROCEDURES AND SCHEDULE OF FINES APPLICABLE (ยง 16-3300)

level.text: The civil infractions set forth in this chapter are subject to the provisions of Chapter 31 (Administrative Procedures) and Chapter 32 (Schedule of Fines) of this Title.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 49 DCR 9857 (November 1, 2002); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 52 DCR 4908 (May 27, 2005).
